main.bio: Hi! I am a student at the last year of Mathematical Engineering with a minor in Statiscal Learning. I am passionate about data science and machine learning. I am currently working as a MATLAB Student Ambassador at Politecnico di Milano for MathWorks. I am looking for an internship or full time position in the field of data science or machine learning.

projects.title: Heart Failure and re - hospitalizations
description: Applied Generalized Linear Models with mixed effects resulting in AUC over 0.75.
Worked with over 10 million records collected from 200k patients.
Performed functional Principal Component Analysis to exploit trend in the number of patients hospitalizations.

projects.title: Estimating Client’s Needs
description: Collaborated with a team of 4 to develop a machine learning model that estimates a client’s needs based on their financial profile.
Analysed and preprocessed data with MATLAB. Prototyped models using Classification Learner.
Deployed machine learning models with Python using Scikit-learn.
Designed a web application using Streamlit to allow users to interact with the model.

projects.title: Bayesian study about gender bias in Mathematics in the region of Catalonia
description: Analyzed gender bias obtaining clear evidence of a difference in results using Bayesian approach.
Simulated the models in R through the JAGS package.
Collaborated with students of different languages and worked with them in Spanish.
